newsitem.title: EU: EP LEGAL AFFAIRS COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 28-30.
newsitem.headline: EP LEGAL AFFAIRS COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 28-30.

text.p: Committee on Legal Affairs and Citizens' Rights [[ Monday 28 October 1996 ]] ===] Monday, 28 October 1996 ===] afternoon 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE219.391 ) 2. Approval of minutes of meeting of: - 02.-03.09.1996 (PE218.791 ) 2.1 In the presence of the Council and Commission 3. Measures to protect minors in the European Union (T03927) (95/026+96/049+96/089) INI0421 INI0421 B4-0443/94 B4-0443/94 B4-0029/96 B4-0029/96 B4-0699/96 B4-0699/96 + JURI Fond R ZIMMERMANN Wilmya. (PSE) (PE213.154/REV) - Consideration of draft report - Decision on procedure 4. Improving the adoption laws (T03928) (95/027) INI0420 INI0420 B4-0568/94 B4-0568/94 + JURI Fond R CASINI Carlo. (PPE)

(PE215.242 ) - Consideration of draft report - Decision on procedure 5. Committee on Regional Policy [[ Monday 28 October 1996 ]] Room 52 - Belliard ===] Monday 28 October at 3 p.m. 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE 218.860 ) 2. Approval of minutes of meetings of: - 8-9 July 1996 (PE218.844 ) - 16 September 1996 (PE218.853 ) 3. Possibly, chairman's announcements 3.1 In the presence of the Council and Commission 4. Report on development problems and structural assistance in Germany (T04671) PMC0117 C(94)1717 C4-0047/96 PMC0152 C(94)3378 C4-0048/96 PMC0020 C(94)3377 C4-0049/96 PMC0107 LET 34349/95 + REGI Fond R BOTZ Gerhard. (PSE) (PE218.847 ) + REGI Fond BOTZ Gerhard. (PSE) (PE218.847 ) 4.1 H E A R I N G 4.2 See attached programme (PE 218.860/ANN ) ===] 5.30 p.m. 5. Future financing of the European Union in respect of enlargement (T04589) (T04589) INI0445 INI0445 + REGI Avis A SCHRODER Jurgen. (PPE) (PE218.871 ) F BUDG Fond R CHRISTODOULOU Efthym (PPE) (PE218.268/RV1) - Adoption of draft opinion 6. Delegation visit to Harnosand - County of Vasternorrland (Sweden) from 25 to 28 June 1996 (VIS0130 ) - Consideration Consideration of the delegation's report 7. Delegation visit to Steiermark/Graz (Austria) from 25 to 28 June 1996 (VIS0129 ) - Consideration Consideration of the delegation's report 8. Mr SPECIALE's visit to the Polish Senate in Warsaw concerning the European U nion's regional policy (DVR0392 ) - Consideration Consideration of report ===] 6.15 p.m. 8.2 Possibly coordinators' meeting ===] Tuesday 29 October at 9 a.m. 9. Community structural policy and employment (T04324) COS0404 COM(96)0109 C4-0230/96 + REGI Fond R LAGE Carlos. (PSE) (PE218.845 ) - Adoption of draft report 10. Implementation of cross-border cooperation between the Community and Centra l and Eastern European countries, 1994 (T04770) COS0385 COM(95)0662 C4-0142/96 + REGI Fond R SCHRODER Jurgen. (PPE) (PE218.344 ) - Adoption of draft report 12. (UPE) (PE218.846 ) + REGI Fond PODESTA G. (UPE)

(PE218.846 ) - Consideration of draft report 13. FIRST CONFERENCE OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND LOCAL AUTHORITIES, HELD IN BRUSSELS (1 - 3 OCTOBER 1996) (DVR0383 ) - Exchange of views on the conclusions to be drawn 14. Towards a new maritime strategy (T04818) COS0405 COM(96)0081 C4-0237/96 + REGI Avis A BERNARDINI Francois. (PSE) F TRAN Fond R DANESIN Alessandro. (UPE) (PE218.415 ) - Presentation by the Commission - Exchange of views 15. Appointment of rapporteurs and draftsmen - decisions on procedure 16. Any other business 17. Date of next meeting (in Brussels) (PE/IX/OJ/96-19 ) - joint hearing with the Committee on Culture on culture and structural policies and their contribution to employment - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
